our_services.title: Notre Services
content: Promotion and visibility of products and services

digital_marketing_service.title: Digital Marketing Service via Subscription Packs
digital_marketing_service.content: Temacina.Com offers several advertising spaces and tools via a subscription system with different periods. Subscription rates are displayed on the Subscription page:

packages.free: Free: Minimum service granted for 12 months.
packages.starter: Starter: Service with more benefits for 3, 6, or 12 months.
packages.silver: Silver: Service with more benefits for 3, 6, or 12 months.
packages.gold: Gold: Service with more benefits for 3, 6, or 12 months.

digital_marketing_service.details: Temacina.com's Digital Marketing includes all marketing strategies and tactics used to promote a company's products or services online for the Algerian, African, and global markets. Our services include:
services: Creating and managing online advertising campaigns
SEO to improve search engine visibility
Email marketing to target prospects and existing customers
Social media management to engage with the online community

online_sales_service.title: Online Sales Service for Intra-Company Transactions
markets: Local B2B Market in Algerian Dinar
International B2B Global Import/Export Market in Dollar

sectors.title: OUR SECTORS
sectors.description: Temacina.Com is a vertical marketplace specializing in four key sectors: Industry, Agriculture, Construction, and I-Tech. We are committed to providing tailored solutions for each sector, fostering the growth and development of businesses in a secure and efficient digital environment. As a leader in our field, we are determined to create opportunities for success for our business partners, contributing to boosting the Algerian economy on the global stage.

industry.title: Industry
industry.description: Temacina.Com Our platform offers a variety of industrial products, such as machinery, equipment, construction materials, and more, facilitating exchanges between local industry players.

agriculture.title: Agriculture
agriculture.description: Temacina.Com We connect agricultural suppliers, cooperatives, and agri-food companies, offering a complete range of agricultural products, from seeds to finished products, to meet local market needs.
categories: Production and Sale of Packaging Products

construction.title: Construction
construction.description: Temacina.Com We offer a multitude of products and services related to the construction sector, including construction materials, site equipment, engineering and consulting services, fostering project development across the country.

i_tech.title: I-Tech (Information and Communication Technology)
i_tech.description: Temacina.Com We facilitate exchanges in the technology sector by connecting companies specializing in software, IT services, telecommunications solutions, and other I-Tech products and services, contributing to Algeria's digital transformation.

why_choose_us.title: WHY CHOOSE Temacina.Com?
reasons: Reliability and Security: Secure and reliable transactions
International Visibility: Access to a global market
Personalized Support: Dedicated assistance to maximize your success
Direct Contact: Instant messaging and online chat for information exchanges, quote requests, negotiations, and additional information

register_and_subscribe.title: REGISTER AND PURCHASE SUBSCRIPTION PACKS
benefits: Maximum Visibility: Increase your products' visibility to a global audience
Targeted Marketing: Access sophisticated marketing tools to promote your products
Networking Opportunities: Connect with potential business partners worldwide
Support and Assistance: Benefit from dedicated customer support to maximize your sales opportunities

visiting_sellers_and_buyers.title: VISITING SELLERS AND BUYERS
benefits: Global Visibility: Increase your products' visibility on an international platform, reaching potential buyers worldwide
Marketing Support: Take advantage of our sophisticated marketing services to promote your products and increase sales
Networking Opportunities: Connect with other companies and potential business partners worldwide
Security and Reliability: Enjoy secure and reliable transactions, ensuring the protection of your data and financial transactions
Access to Instant Messaging and Online Chat: Facilitate information exchanges, quote requests, negotiations, and obtain additional information with our real-time communication tools
Early Benefits: As an early subscriber, enjoy exclusive benefits such as preferential rates, personalized services, and increased visibility

subscribed_sellers_and_buyers.title: SUBSCRIBED SELLERS AND BUYERS
benefits: Continuous Growth: We continuously invest in marketing to attract new buyers and increase your customer base
Feedback and Improvement: Your feedback is essential to us. We constantly improve our platform to meet your needs and optimize your user experience

online_sales.title: ONLINE SALES
online_sales.description: Take advantage of our next development phase, which will include online sales services, opening up new growth opportunities and diversifying your sales channels.
benefits: Dedicated Customer Support: Benefit from dedicated customer support to answer all your questions and help you maximize your sales opportunities
Collaboration Opportunities: Participate in collaborative initiatives with other companies and partners to strengthen your market position

online_sales_with_payment_methods.title: ONLINE SALES WITH GLOBAL PAYMENT METHODS
online_sales_with_payment_methods.description: After the initial marketing phase, we will launch online sales services to offer even more growth opportunities to our sellers.
online_sales_services: Online Sales Platform: Offer your products directly on our platform with an intuitive and user-friendly interface
Order Management: Track and manage orders in real-time, with instant notifications for each new order
Online Inventory: Manage inventory with automatic updates to ensure product availability
Warranty Service: Offer your customers peace of mind with a warranty on sold products
After-Sales Service: Provide after-sales support to resolve any issues or answer customer questions
Dispute Management: An effective system to manage and resolve disputes between sellers and buyers
Refund Policy: Ensure a clear and fair refund policy to maintain customer satisfaction

global_payment_methods.title: GLOBAL ONLINE PAYMENT METHODS
methods: Visa and MasterCard: Accept credit and debit card payments from major global brands
American Express: Facilitate transactions for customers using American Express cards
PayPal: Offer a secure and popular payment option via PayPal, allowing for fast and secure transactions
Bank Transfer: Accept bank transfer payments for national and international transactions
Other Payment Methods: Integrate additional payment methods to cater to specific markets or customer preferences

secure_and_reliable_transactions.title: SECURE AND RELIABLE TRANSACTIONS
secure_and_reliable_transactions.description: At Temacina.Com, we prioritize the security and reliability of your transactions. Our platform uses advanced encryption technologies to protect your data and ensure secure transactions. Additionally, we implement rigorous security measures to prevent fraud and unauthorized access to your information.

maximum_international_visibility.title: MAXIMUM INTERNATIONAL VISIBILITY
maximum_international_visibility.description: With Temacina.Com, your products gain global visibility, allowing you to reach potential buyers worldwide. Our platform offers various tools and features to enhance your product visibility and increase your sales opportunities. Benefit from our global marketing strategies to attract new customers and expand your market reach.

personalized_support_and_assistance.title: PERSONALIZED SUPPORT AND ASSISTANCE
personalized_support_and_assistance.description: Our dedicated support team is here to assist you every step of the way. Whether you need help with setting up your account, managing your products, or optimizing your sales strategies, we provide personalized support to ensure your success on our platform. Contact us through instant messaging, online chat, or email for prompt and efficient assistance.

direct_contact_for_information_exchanges.title: DIRECT CONTACT FOR INFORMATION EXCHANGES
direct_contact_for_information_exchanges.description: Communicate directly with potential buyers and sellers through our instant messaging and online chat features. Exchange information, request quotes, negotiate terms, and obtain additional details quickly and efficiently. Our communication tools facilitate seamless interactions and help you build strong business relationships.

constant_investment_in_marketing.title: CONSTANT INVESTMENT IN MARKETING
constant_investment_in_marketing.description: We continuously invest in marketing to attract new buyers and increase your customer base. Our marketing efforts include online advertising, social media campaigns, SEO strategies, and more. By promoting our platform and your products, we help you achieve continuous growth and maximize your sales potential.

feedback_and_continuous_improvement.title: FEEDBACK AND CONTINUOUS IMPROVEMENT
feedback_and_continuous_improvement.description: Your feedback is essential to us. We constantly strive to improve our platform to meet your needs and optimize your user experience. Share your suggestions and feedback with us, and we will work diligently to enhance our services and provide you with the best possible experience on Temacina.Com.
